div.h2: SNOMED CT Reason Medication Not Given Codes
div.p: This value set includes all medication refused, medication not administered, and non administration of necessary drug or medicine codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright � 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 406149000
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 371900001
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 242990004
